author: smorovic
body:
#### PR description:

Moved to jsoncollector namespace to avoid conflict with tensorflow import of this lib (newer version).

#### PR validation:

Tested in DAQ test system and produces valid json files.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of #44989
See also:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44975
title: (DAQ) jsoncpp moved to a namespace (14_0_X backport)
